summary: This mod adds a small property next to whiterun for my own use figured i could release it so everybody could use it if they want.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/jgs4nc.jpg[/IMG]

Homestead Whiterun - a property located east of whiterun, marker is visible and travelable. Comes with most crafting facilities except butter churn i think. Lots of alchemical ingredients all over, and a garden, and sitting areas, and insects, and statue

[img]http://www.wowtoys.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/11/functions-n-features.jpg[/img]

.Fenced in property with gate
.Grindstone
.Garden with Hearthfire plots
.Tons of ingredients
.Enchanting workbench with safe underneath for storage
.Alchemy workbench dark elf urns for storage by map of solstheim
.All smithing in backyard
.Auriel shrine
.Talos shrine
.Many sitting areas
.Storage chests next to front door and in dinning area and a couple strongboxes in the bedroom
.Staff crafting station
.Open Bar
.And a whole lot more
.Secret chest

if updating from a previous version travel far away then type pcb into the console then travel back and the garden should work

probably not follower friendly idk how to navmesh and no childrens rooms

It runs on my rig
AMD Phenom(tm) II X6 1055T Processor 2.80 GHz
4.00 GB
64-bit Operating System Win 7
NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti

I cleared the area around the property of grass and rocks so it would run better and i don't mind cuz im in the walls so i don't see it very often

this is one of my first mods i've been tinkering with the creation kit for years but i just recently picked it back up and learned some new things i am still new to modding so some things might not be perfect

REQUIRES - DAWNGUARD HEARTHFIRE DRAGONBORN and i used Paintings and Frames by Artisanix (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17423/?)
author: Dennisbam23
